title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 21.0 - Finding of fact
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 21.0 - Finding of fact

State Regulations

The board finds that the trade, occupation or process of
cleaning the windows of public buildings involves such elements of danger to
the lives, health or safety of persons employed therein as to require special
regulations for the protection of such persons, in that such trade, occupation
or process necessarily involves the constant hazard of falling from dangerous
heights and creates a substantial risk of serious injury to such persons and
others. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
21.0

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
